The 'European Broadcasting Union' ('EBU'; ) is the world's foremost alliance of
public service media entities, comprising 74 Active Members in 56 countries and
35 Associate Members from a further 22 countries. It is unrelated to the
European Union. [http://www.ebu.ch/en/ebu_members/associates/index.php European
Broadcasting Union list of Associate Members]. Ebu.ch (6 January 2012).
Retrieved on 2012-01-15.
